name: NaziShootout
description:
GamePlay: Buy guns and ammo with gold. Kill nazis in town and try to survive as long as possible.

Features:

• FPS: NaziShootout is a first person shooter

• Guns: LugerP08, Thompson, Sten, Welrod, and more!

• Survive: Survive as long as possible in town from nazis

• $Gold: Used to purchase guns and ammo in town

• HardCore: No save/load, no hp or armor ui, and no checkpoints

• KillCount: Keep track of nazis killed
